channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The IPO Market Gets Cold Feet
item.description: Fears of stock turbulence could further delay a rebound in companies’ new listings.

item.title: Kevin Spacey is ‘refusing to leave’ $5.6 million Baltimore condo unit after foreclosure auction
item.description: The actor revealed back in June that he was being forced to sell off the home at in a bid to help cover hefty legal fees.

item.title: Why 7-Eleven Is So Enticing to Circle K's Owner
item.description: The Japanese conglomerate would provide immediate growth in the U.S., but it won’t come easy.

item.title: Nvidia has all the pieces in place for a positive quarterly earnings surprise
item.description: Having taken the lead in AI chips, Nvidia is bleeding its competitors dry.

item.title: Warren Buffett Is Selling Bank of America. Maybe You Should Buy It.
item.description: The lender has some advantages relative to its megabank peers in an interest-rate-cutting scenario.

item.title: Powell’s Jackson Hole pivot on rate cuts won’t be his last
item.description: The U.S. economy is too strong for the Fed to be so dovish about interest rates.

item.title: The U.S. Corn Crop Is Great. Farmers' Finances, Not So Much.
item.description: Grain prices have been in free fall since the Covid commodity boom ended, forcing some on the farm to consider difficult changes.

item.title: Bitcoin surge has seen the number of crypto millionaires double
item.description: The number of individuals with more than $1 million worth of crypto holdings increased 95% in the 12 months ending on July 1, to 172,300 people

item.title: Heard on the Street's Stock-Picking Series
item.description: Check out the stocks Heard on the Street writers favor in their eighth annual stock-picking contest.

item.title: Icahn Enterprises’ stock closes at 21-year low after plan to offer up to $400 million of shares
item.description: Icahn Enterprises’ stock tumbled 13% Monday to put it on track for a 21-year low, after billionaire Carl Icahn’s publicly traded investing arm filed t...
